mapper.select: select * from kor_dict where word like CONCAT(#{keyword},'%') limit 10

SELECT kor.* from (select * from kor_dict) kor WHERE
id < #{korDictId} and
MATCH (word) AGAINST (#{keyword} in natural language mode) order by word=#{keyword} desc , pronunciation=CONCAT('[',#{keyword},']') desc, id desc limit 10
SELECT kor.id, kor.word, kor.pronunciation, kor.meaning, kor.example, kor.classification from (select * from kor_dict) kor WHERE MATCH (word) AGAINST (#{keyword} in natural language mode) limit 500
